deriveFunction

public java.lang.String deriveFunction(java.lang.String fx,
                                       java.lang.String gx,
                                       char dx)
Derives equation parts in the form fx[gx] -> fx'[gx]*gx' given that fx is a function of gx

Parameters:
fx - the function in the form: "cos" or "lg3"
gx - the inner function
